Config.siteDescription: The Jeanne Caroline MFEGE Foundation is committed to promoting education, health, and the empowerment of vulnerable communities in Africa. Discover our initiatives, social projects, and charitable actions for a better future. Join us to make a difference.

HomePage.title: A gesture to save lives
HomePage.subtitle: Welcome to the Jeanne Caroline MFEGE Foundation. Because every gesture matters, together we build a future where health is a priority. Join us in our mission for lasting impact.
HomePage.aboutDescription: The Jeanne Caroline Mfege Foundation draws its inspiration from the life and values of Jeanne Caroline Mfege, a woman recognized for her generosity and dedication.
HomePage.donateDescription: Support the Jeanne Caroline Mfege Foundation in its mission to provide accessible and quality healthcare. Your contribution, regardless of its nature or amount, can make a real difference in the lives of vulnerable populations.
HomePage.galleryDescription: Immerse yourself in the actions of the Jeanne Caroline Mfege Foundation through our gallery. Explore the progress of our infrastructure under construction, an ambitious project aimed at providing quality healthcare to rural populations.
HomePage.contactTitle: Let's stay in touch: Together, let's make a difference!
HomePage.contactDescription: Do you have a question, want to learn more about our actions, or consider a partnership? The Jeanne Caroline Mfege Foundation is here to listen.

Footer.description: A donation for health, a precious contribution that nurtures well-being and spreads hope.

AboutPage.description: Together for quality healthcare and a healthier future
AboutPage.historyDescription1: was born from a story of resilience, faith, and love. On May 10, 2021, Jeanne Caroline MFEGE passed away from ovarian cancer after a long battle fought with courage and dignity. This ordeal, marked by periods of intense suffering and difficulties in accessing healthcare, was transcended by deep spirituality and trust in God.
AboutPage.historyDescription2: It is in this spirit that her husband and loved ones wished to preserve her legacy by establishing a foundation dedicated to providing healthcare access for vulnerable populations. Driven by the ideals of solidarity and kindness that guided Jeanne Caroline, this initiative aims to offer essential healthcare services to those in greatest need.
AboutPage.missionDescription: Inspired by the life and commitment of Jeanne Caroline Mfege, the Foundation is dedicated to:
AboutPage.mission1Description: Organizing regular screening campaigns for early detection of this silent disease.
AboutPage.mission2Description: Providing quality care to rural populations with limited mobility, complementing the efforts of the Cameroonian government.
AboutPage.mission3Description: Addressing the needs related to endemic diseases such as malaria and typhoid fever in surrounding villages.
AboutPage.valuesDescription: The foundation is built on strong values that guide our daily actions
AboutPage.values1Description: Providing accessible healthcare to the most vulnerable.
AboutPage.values2Description: Welcoming every patient with compassion and respect.
AboutPage.values3Description: Serving with dedication to improve people's quality of life.
AboutPage.values4Description: Ensuring quality healthcare through professional medical services.
AboutPage.ourEngagementDescription: The foundation works alongside government efforts to address the healthcare needs of rural populations. Many nearby villages (Ekiembié 2, Eyek, Ekiembié 1, Akekela, Zili, Ebolsi, Ngou, etc.) have limited access to healthcare infrastructure. We are committed to bridging this medical gap by establishing a local healthcare facility.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.description: The foundation under construction aims to provide essential services to ensure comprehensive and high-quality healthcare for the community.
Services.imDescription: Examinations for accurate diagnosis using advanced imaging technologies.
Services.radioDescription: Specialized services for the identification and monitoring of pathologies.
Services.pediatricDescription: Medical care dedicated to children for their health and well-being.
Services.oncologyDescription: Care for cancer patients with tailored treatments.
Services.heartDescription: Services for screening, prevention, and treatment of heart diseases.
Services.medecineDescription: Consultations for overall health management and primary care.

Gallery.title: Gallery
Gallery.description: Dive into the heart of the Jeanne Caroline Mfege Foundation's actions through our gallery. Explore the evolution of our infrastructure under construction, an ambitious project designed to offer quality healthcare to rural populations.
